title: ParaType
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Founderies](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Founderies) : ParaType**

[Russian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Russia) type foundry specializing in adapting type designs to the [cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/cyrillic) alphabet, as well as publishing original typeface designs.

**Additional Articles:**  
 [dot-font: From Russia with Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004653/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23282.html)
author: paul d hunt
